title: Epitaph for Ioulia Domitia
support: Marble plaque set in plaster in modern times.

handNote.lettering: Rhomboid Ο. The letters at l. 3 are slightly larger and more spaced out than the other lines.

date._: From the second half of the 1st cent. to the end of the 2nd cent.  CE(Korhonen)

provenanceFound._: Described as 'found in the city of Catania, by Torremuzza

provenanceObserved._: Observed by Torremuzza and Kaibel in Museo dei Benedettini, later by Korhonen in magazzino del cortile, Collezione dei Benedettini (formerly sala VI.102)

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

location.address: Castello Ursino, Piazza Federico II di Svevia, 95121 Catania (CT)
